user_query: I'm organizing a charity run in my neighborhood and need to map out the route.

TaskList.description: Get geocoordinates for the starting point of the charity run.
Get geocoordinates for the checkpoints along the route.
Get geocoordinates for the finish line of the charity run.
Fetch human-readable addresses for the starting point based on the geocoordinates obtained in Subtask 1.
Fetch human-readable addresses for the checkpoints based on the geocoordinates obtained in Subtask 2.
Fetch human-readable addresses for the finish line based on the geocoordinates obtained in Subtask 3.
